actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend Section 1812, Revised Statutes, pertaining to the Annual Report of the Chief of Engineers.

summary.text: Requires the Army Chief of Engineers, within nine months after the end of a fiscal year, to submit to the Secretary of the Army a report concerning the operations of the Washington Aqueduct, in the District of Columbia, during that year.

titles.title: A bill to amend Section 1812, Revised Statutes, pertaining to the Annual Report of the Chief of Engineers.
